page.title: 01LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: {...Area Milestones.. {Holy Trinity Church. 1086{Domesday Survey.}Village assessed as one hide, 120 acres. 1208{St. Mary the Virgin church}built. 1605 Gunpowder plotters at{Northbrook. 1642 Cavaliers & Roundheads{-Gannaway. 1660 Hearth tax returns. 1793 Warwick-Birmingham{canal]}Hatton. 1795{Windmill}built. 1801 First census. Pop.N.L.village 95. 1851{Railway}through Hatton built. 1876{Wolverton School]}65 children. 1889 Steam power added to the{mill. 1915 The{stocks}finally removed. 1920{Telephone}service in the village. 1925 Parishes unite,N.L.+ W.+ Langley. 1929 First{bus}service. 1936{Electricity}arrived. 1958{Mains water }supply laid on. 1967{Sewerage }scheme completed. 1985 Free buses for shopping areas.
